thread.title: Trump expected to return to Palm Beach next weekend - Sun Sentinel
thread.title_full: Trump expected to return to Palm Beach next weekend - Sun Sentinel

author: Dan Sweeney
title: Trump expected to return to Palm Beach next weekend - Sun Sentinel
text:
News Politics Florida Politics Blog Trump expected to return to Palm Beach next weekend 
Donald Trump has owned Mar-a-Lago, the Palm Beach estate built by cereal heiress Marjorie Merriweather Post, since the 1980s. Trump turned it into a private club and is using it as his Weekend White House. Dan Sweeney is expected to return to his Weekend White House in Palm Beach next weekend. 
The Federal Aviation Administration has issued flight restrictions around Mar-a-Lago for the weekend of March 3-5, a sign that Trump plans on visiting his estate. 
Trump has spend three weekends there since becoming president. He’s expected to remain in Washington this weekend to prepare his speech to a joint session of Congress on Tuesday night. 
While Trump is in Palm Beach, only military, commercial and cargo airplanes with announced flight plans will be allowed within 10 miles of Mar-a-Lago. 
Other aircraft are permitted within 30 miles as long as they have a flight plan and are taking off or landing at an airport within the 30-mile limit. Caption Trump administration altered bathroom policies for transgender students in public schools 
The Trump administration revoked federal requirements for public schools to let transgender students use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their gender identity. 
The Trump administration revoked federal requirements for public schools to let transgender students use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their gender identity. Caption Trump administration altered bathroom policies for transgender students in public schools 
The Trump administration revoked federal requirements for public schools to let transgender students use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their gender identity. 
The Trump administration revoked federal requirements for public schools to let transgender students use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their gender identity. Caption The debate over President Trump’s mental health 
The New York Times published a letter signed by 35 psychiatrists, psychologists and social workers. The letter suggests Trump’s “grave emotional instability… makes him incapable of serving safely as president.” (Feb. 21, 2017) 
The New York Times published a letter signed by 35 psychiatrists, psychologists and social workers. The letter suggests Trump’s “grave emotional instability… makes him incapable of serving safely as president.” (Feb. 21, 2017) Caption Alex Acosta named as new Labor secretary nominee 
Florida International University law school dean R. Alexander Acosta has been named President Donald Trump's new choice for secretary of labor. 
Florida International University law school dean R. Alexander Acosta has been named President Donald Trump's new choice for secretary of labor. Caption Trump Goes On Offensive In Solo Press Conference 
CBS Miami’s Eliott Rodriguez reports. 
CBS Miami’s Eliott Rodriguez reports. Caption Andy Puzder withdraws as Labor secretary nominee amid Republican opposition 
Puzder’s confirmation hearing was delayed four times over eight weeks. 
Puzder’s confirmation hearing was delayed four times over eight weeks. 
Training flights, sky banners, and engine-less craft such as hot-air balloons and gliders are banned within 30 miles of the estate. 
Twelve aircraft violated a temporary restriction on the airspace near the Mar-a-lago this past weekend, according to the Federal Aviation Administration . Five of those aircraft were buzzed by military aircraft, and a sonic boom was heard throughout Broward and Palm Beach counties on Friday night.
